name: Snail Simulator 2020 XL
description:
Download now for free to play the most anticipated game of 2020!

Snail Sim is the ultimate snail simulation experience on PC, featuring state of the art graphics and technology to give players the most realistic experience possible.

(IMPORTANT: The game might take a bit to start up after launching the program, just give it a few seconds to load)

FEATURES:

-Real time ray tracing and lighting effects
-Day/night cycle
-Photorealistic graphics and textures
-Battle royale (COMING SOON)

Hardware and software requirements:

-Quad core Intel i7 proccessor
-Nividia RTX 2080
-64 gb of dedicated RAM
-5 TB of storage space

Oh and happy april fools I guess.
